name: Penguin Hatchery
description:
Penguin Hatchery is a game about hatching penguins. Yeah, that's pretty much it. With the help of some clicking and some random things that sometimes make sense, sometimes don't you can begin to hatch penguin eggs and eventually hatch them at an insane rate!

- 20 Upgrades
- 9 Achievements

More updates will be coming but I’m just one man so timing of the updates will be a little all over the place. Join the discord to ask questions and keep better updated.
